"Thank you, partner, thank you! This rep: "It seems like Darker activity isn't as intense right now as it was on that mission we did together."
"...Well, what we saw before was a very sudden outbreak, so it's difficult to say."
"Thanks, partner! I feel a lot better now. Now, how can I reward you..."
"...That's it, you can have my Partner Card! It's not much of a thank you, but please call me any time!"

You can now call Afin as a partner.

"Once you have met certain conditions,
you can adventure with partner characters.

Partner characters can be called
from the terminal in the Campship.

However, you can't call partner characters
who have already been called in the same room."
